property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

property.name: Items
property.summary: Gets or sets the mixed associated with this Form List.

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether this form has been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with the specified text.

remarks.p: Because property Items represents a mixed each form which is retrieved from the collection must be cast into its specific types before properties and methods specific to each form can be accessed.
